name: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
actors: Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley
desc: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

name: The Fate of the Furious
actors: Vin Diesel, Jason Statham, Dwayne Johnson, Michelle Rodriguez
desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of terrorism and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew face trials that will test them as never before.

name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
actors: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei
desc: Peter Parker tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and must confront a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

name: Thor: Ragnarok
actors: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Idris Elba
desc: Imprisoned, the mighty Thor finds himself in a lethal gladiatorial contest against the Hulk, his former ally. Thor must fight for survival and race against time to prevent the all-powerful Hela from destroying his home and the Asgardian civilization.

name: Despicable Me 3
actors: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Trey Parker, Miranda Cosgrove
desc: Gru meets his long-lost charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

name: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
actors: Dylan O'Brien, Ki Hong Lee, Kaya Scodelario, Thomas Brodie-Sangster
desc: Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as the 'Flare'.
